title: Union Home Minister and Minister of Cooperation Shri Amit Shah extends greetings to all our scientists, researchers on National Science Day
text:
Press Release:Press Information Bureau

Ministry of Home Affairs

Union Home Minister and Minister of Cooperation Shri Amit Shah extends greetings to all our scientists, researchers on National Science Day

Your quest lights our path shaping solutions for a better future
May this day renew our zest and resolve to innovate, build and craft destiny of our choice

Posted On:
28 FEB 2026 1:41PM by PIB Delhi

Union Home Minister and Minister of Cooperation Shri Amit Shah has extended greetings to all our scientists, researchers on National Science Day.

In a post on X platform, Union Home Minister and Minister of Cooperation Shri Amit Shah said “Greetings to all our scientists, researchers on National Science Day. Your quest lights our path shaping solutions for a better future. May this day renew our zest and resolve to innovate, build and craft destiny of our choice.”



Greetings to all our scientists, researchers on
#NationalScienceDay
. Your quest lights our path shaping solutions for a better future. May this day renew our zest and resolve to innovate, build and craft destiny of our choice.
— Amit Shah (@AmitShah)
February 28, 2026
